protocol_name: UK REF 2014 Analysis Data and R Script
protocol_name_html: UK REF 2014 Analysis Data and R Script
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dgflu","text":"This collection of files contains the raw data and R script for the paper entitled 'The UK Research Excellence Framework and the Matthew Effect: Insights from machine learning.'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68bv9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6dts","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad6qo","text":"Data:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7him","text":"The file balbuena_REF_2014.dta is a Stata 12 file that contains the data for the paper. It is also saved in CSV format as Balbuena_REF_2014.csv","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":8,"length":23,"style":"bold"},{"offset":122,"length":21,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ge3k","text":"The file balbuena_ref_syntax.R contains the syntax used to run the analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":9,"length":30,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v4dm","text":"The file balbuena_REF.RData file contains the data objects in RData format. See the instructions below if you wish to replicate the analysis.  To simply view the data in Excel without re-running the analysis, the universities in the training set (n  = 79) and testing set (n=30)  are provided in the excel file “REF_2014_schools.xls”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":9,"length":18,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8socp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcve2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: This protocol was used for producing the results of the paper: The UK Research Excellence Framework and the Matthew Effect: Insights from machine learning.

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5rpkl","text":"Load the RData file using the command Session | Load Workspace. If you wish to import the Stata or Excel files (#1), use the Part I section of the syntax file.
